description:
THE DATA SCIENCE INSTITUTE WILL BE INVITING STUDENTS FROM UC MERCED AND UC
RIVERSIDE TO PARTICIPATE IN A DATA SCIENCE CHALLENGE AT LLNL. IN THE CHALLENGE,
THE STUDENTS WILL EXPLORE A DATA-DRIVEN APPROACH TO RECONSTRUCTING ELECTROANATOMICAL
MAPS OF THE HEART AT CLINICALLY RELEVANT RESOLUTIONS, COMBINING
INPUT FROM THE STANDARD 12-LEAD ECG WITH ADVANCED MACHINE LEARNING
TECHNIQUES. THE DATA THE STUDENTS WILL HAVE ACCESS TO HAS BEEN IM REVIEWED FOR
EXTERNAL RELEASE. (LLNL-MI-835833) THESE NOTEBOOKS WILL PROVIDE THE STUDENTS
WITH INSTRUCTIONS OF HOW TO LOAD THE DATA AND WORK WITH THE DATA, ALONG WITH
TUTORIALS TO DO BASIC MACHINE LEARNING TASKS LIKE LOGISTIC REGRESSION AND IMAGE
CLASSIFICATION.
name: 2023 Data Science Challenge Notebooks
